alert.note: Alert for Cowley; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:59PM CDT until June 22 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR WESTERN COWLEY AND SOUTHEASTERN SUMNER COUNTIES... At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arkansas City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Oxford, Udall, South Haven, Geuda Springs, Rock, Hunnewell, Strother Field Airport and Winfield City Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
